name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
IT Automation Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in IT automation, DevOps, and scripting across various environments. Proficient in **Python**, **Bash**, and **PowerShell**, with a strong focus on Rest API integration and automation tools such as **Ansible** and **Jenkins**. Expertise in designing and implementing **CI/CD** pipelines and utilizing infrastructure as code principles with **Terraform** to streamline deployment processes.

Well-versed in managing both **Windows** and **Linux** administration, alongside macOS environments, ensuring seamless operations with tools like **VMware** and **vCenter**. Strong analytical skills demonstrated by implementing monitoring solutions with **Grafana**, **Zabbix**, and **PRTG**, facilitating proactive system performance and reliability.

Additionally, a Full Stack Developer skilled in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered applications capable of predictive analytics and real-time processing, with cloud deployment on **AWS** and **Azure**. Strong commitment to compliance-driven development with familiarity in HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards.
